entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
